title: Support building docs without running all notebooks
body:
Following https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/pull/400, when running `make html` in the docs folder, the build will fail

```
reading sources... [ 17%] api/notes
reading sources... [ 19%] api/notes/data_api
reading sources... [ 21%] api/notes/sequence_sampling
reading sources... [ 23%] api/notes/vocab_emb
reading sources... [ 25%] api/vocab
reading sources... [ 27%] examples/elmo/elmo_sentence_representation
reading sources... [ 29%] examples/language_model/language_model
reading sources... [ 31%] examples/machine_translation/gnmt
reading sources... [ 33%] examples/machine_translation/transformer

Exception occurred:
  File "/home/ubuntu/software/gluon-nlp/conda/doc/lib/python3.6/site-packages/recommonmark/states.py", line 134, in run_role
    content=content)
TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not callable
The full traceback has been saved in /tmp/sphinx-err-c1p35yx0.log, if you want to report the issue to the developers.
Please also report this if it was a user error, so that a better error message can be provided next time.
A bug report can be filed in the tracker at <https://github.com/sphinx-doc/sphinx/issues>. Thanks!
Makefile:57: recipe for target 'html' failed
make: *** [html] Error 2

```

There is some syntax issue in `examples/machine_translation/transformer` that causes ReCommonMark to fail when parsing `examples/machine_translation/transformer.md`
